items.name: Straight Talk Unimax Mobile Wifi Hotspot
items.categoryPath: Cell Phones/Mobile Hotspots & Plans/Signal Boosters & Devices
items.shortDescription: <div style="background: #f2f8fd; padding: 5px;">The Straight Talk Unimax Mobile Wifi Hotspot is your internet connection at home or on the go. This Straight Talk Hotspot allows you to pay up front rather than receiving a bill at the end of the month for internet. There are no commitments, no overage fees, no activation fees, no cancellation fees, and no contracts!<br><br> <b>What you need to get started:</b><br> 1. Straight Talk Hotspot <br>2. Straight Talk service plan (<a href="http://www.walmart.com/browse/cell-phones/mobile-hotspots-plans/1105910_1163447?cat_id=1105910_1163447&facet=service_carrier:Straight%20Talk" target="_blank">shop here</a>)<br>3. Activate your hotspot by following the instructions included in the box or by calling 1.877.430.2355</div>
items.longDescription: <p>The Straight Talk Unimax Mobile Wifi Hotspot allows you to enjoy wireless Internet while on the go. This innovative device requires no contract and can connect more than one device at a time to WiFi. Take it along to the local library or coffee shop for instant access to the Internet. With the Straight Talk mobile hotspot, there is no software to install. As many as five devices can be connected at the same time. It features a user-friendly interface and may be used with a laptop or tablet. There are no monthly fees or charges with the Straight Talk HotSpot (3G) and flexible data cards are available for purchase.<br></p><b>Straight Talk Unimax Mobile Wifi Hotspot:</b><ul><li>Wireless Internet connection</li><li>No software to install</li><li>Connect your laptop or tablet and enjoy Internet connection</li><li>Straight Talk mobile hotspot allows you to connect up to 5 WiFi devices</li><li>User-friendly web interface</li><li>No contract</li><li>No monthly fees or charges</li><li>Flexible data cards available</li></ul>

items.name: Acer Mineral Gray 14" Aspire One Cloudbook AO1-431-C8G8 Laptop PC with Intel Celeron N3050 Processor, 2GB Memory, 32GB eMMC, Windows 10 and Office 365 Personal 1-year included
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Laptops/Shop Laptops by Type/All Laptop Computers
items.shortDescription: Introducing Acer's new Aspire One Cloudbook 14, an affordable Windows-based PC that provides easy access to files and apps from anywhere. Don't worry about backups, updates or synching your device — its done automatically! The Aspire One Cloudbook makes it easy to connect to the Web with the latest 802.11ac wireless technology providing up to three times faster speeds than traditional wireless technology. Moreover, Bluetooth 4.0 lets you wirelessly connect the laptop to Bluetooth-enabled devices like mobile phones, speakers and headphones for cable-free work and play. The stunning 14-inch HD widescreen LED-backlit display delivers an incredible viewing experience of videos, photos or work wherever you are. Also, with a 1-year subscription Office 365 Personal, you have the latest full versions of Office applications, such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote and Outlook

items.name: T-Mobile Samsung Galaxy S4 Prepaid Smartphone
items.categoryPath: Cell Phones/No-Contract Phones & Plans/Shop all No-Contract Phones
items.shortDescription: Stay connected while on-the-go with this T-Mobile Samsung Galaxy S4 Prepaid Smartphone. It comes packed with features for today's busy lifestyles. It includes front and rear cameras for capturing those fun and special moments. Powered by the Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean operating system, the T-Mobile prepaid smartphone features a 5" Super AMOLED touchscreen resolution. The 13MP camera with flash and zero shutter lag has autofocus and BurstShot functions. This Android prepaid smartphone also offers voice-activated functions including dialing. The text, picture and social network messaging functions enable you to easily keep in touch with your friends.
items.longDescription: <br><b>T-Mobile Samsung Galaxy S4 Prepaid Smartphone:</b><ul><li>5" Super AMOLED screen</li><li>1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution</li><li>16GB built-in memory with microSD slot</li><li>4G LTE</li><li>Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) OS</li><li>1.9GHz quad-core processor</li><li>T-Mobile prepaid smartphone supports Bluetooth connectivity</li><li>Smartphone mobile hotspot ready</li><li>WiFi calling capability</li><li>Front-facing 2MP camera with zero shutter lag</li><li>Rear-facing 13MP camera with flash and zero shutter lag</li><li>Autofocus</li><li>Backlit camera sensor</li><li>BurstShot</li><li>HD camcorder</li><li>Apps, Android Market</li><li>Alarm clock</li><li>Calculator</li><li>Calendar</li><li>Conference calling</li><li>Email</li><li>Messaging (text, picture and social networking)</li><li>Near Field Communication (NFC)</li><li>Music player</li><li>Samsung Media Hub</li><li>Screen Share</li><li>Swype</li><li>Android prepaid smartphone with T-Mobile TV</li><li>Visual voice mail</li><li>Voice-activated functions</li><li>Voice dialing</li><li>Speakerphone</li><li>3.5mm audio jack</li></ul>

items.name: T-Mobile 4G Mobile Hotspot
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Networking/Access Points, Hubs & Switches
items.shortDescription: Take your WiFi connection with you on the go with this T-Mobile 4G Mobile Hotspot. It allows you to connect at high speeds and acts as your personal mobile broadband connection. You can securely connect up to five WiFi-enabled devices, such as tablets, laptops or additional smartphones, anywhere you have cellular service with this 4G hotspot. This device features a high-resolution screen with an easy-to-read LCD display. The mobile WiFi hotspot is an ideal solution for travel with international roaming service so you can access the web on compatible data networks throughout the world. It delivers HSPA+ data speed and can easily support memory from 64MB to 128MB. The saved multimedia files and data can be transferred easily by removing the memory card and inserting it directly into another electronic device or storage system.
items.longDescription: This 4G hotspot supports text messaging, phone calls and Internet browsing and is compatible with both Windows and Mac devices. It contains easy-to-follow directions for stress-free installation and includes a charger and a USB cable.<br><b>T-Mobile 4G Mobile Hotspot:</b><ul><li>HSPA+ data speed</li><li>256MHz chipset</li><li>1.4" OLED LCD screen</li><li>Screen Resolution: 128 x 128</li><li>Memory: 64MB/128MB</li><li>WiFi sharing</li><li>Mobile WiFi hotspot includes charger and USB cable</li></ul>

items.longDescription: You can have easy internet access wherever you go with this Straight Talk Wi-Fi Mobile Hotspot, Unimax U240C. This is a reconditioned mobile device that provides quality wireless Internet service at home or on the go. With the Straight Talk mobile hotspot with bonus $15 1GB data plan, you can connect your tablet, laptop or smartphone. You'll be able to check emails, watch videos, play games, surf the web and stay connected. The tablet allows 3G/Wi-Fi connectivity and the hotspot fits in your pocket to connect on the go. The refurbished 3G Wi-Fi hotspot works with a Wi-Fi enabled device. You have access to 30 and 60-day plans. Each hotspot includes the device, a battery, charger, USB cable, activation instructions and a service guide. Access these features with the Straight Talk Wi-Fi Mobile Hotspot, Unimax U240C. <br><br><b>Refurbished Straight Talk Unimax Prepaid U240C Mobile Hotspot with $15 1GB Data Plan:</b><ul><li>3G/Wi-Fi connectivity</li><li>Fits in your pocket to connect on the go</li><li>Enjoy no contract internet connection</li><li>Icon device status indicators</li><li>Works with any Wi-Fi-enabled device</li><li>User-Friendly Web UI: no software to install</li><li>30-day and 60-day plans available</li><li>Includes a hotspot device, battery, charger, usb cable, activation instructions and service guide</li><li>Includes a Straight Talk mobile hotspot w/bonus $15 1GB data plan</li></ul>

items.name: Acer Sky Blue 11.6" R11 R3-131T-C1YF touch screen 2-in-1 Convertible Laptop PC with Intel Celeron N3050 Processor, 2GB Memory, 32GB eMMC and Windows 10
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Laptops/Shop Laptops by Type/All Laptop Computers
items.shortDescription: You weren't designed to sit still and neither was the Acer Aspire R11. From cooking in the kitchen, watching a movie or reading a story before bed, its four modes were designed to flow with you. Its incredible 360 Dual-Torque Hinge delivers the perfect combination of flexibility and strength so you can effortlessly open the lid with just one hand yet have enough torque to have a wobble-free touch experience. Use the Aspire R11 as a mobile tablet on the go, optimize productivity in its comfortable laptop mode and pivot the screen in multiple ways to share and create with others. You can even open it 180 degrees and easily share the content and collaborate with a person sitting across from you. The PC detects the mode you are in and adjusts the wallpaper and background accordingly. An Intel Celeron processor in the Aspire R11 means you get the best of both worlds. Experience Intel-level performance that lets you enjoy entertainment and get your work done.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Acer Sky Blue 11.6" R11 R3-131T-C1YF Convertible Laptop PC:</b><br><br><b>Key Features and Benefits:</b><ul><li>Intel Celeron N3050 dual-core processor<br>1.60GHz (with items.shortDescription: The Straight Talk Huawei H226C Refurbished Prepaid Wireless Home Phone With Bonus $15 Nationwide Plan will make it simple for you to communicate. It includes an unlimited plan for both domestic and international calls, so you can get the convenient connection you want right away. This Straight Talk wireless home phone offers quality service at cost-efficient rates and is an affordable alternative to a traditional landline phone. It also includes a 30-day Nationwide Plan for $15. This is an easy and inexpensive way to stay in touch with friends and family. This prepaid home phone has a rechargeable battery which allows you to make and receive calls in case of power outage. It has a slim size that will sit nicely on counters and shelves. The Straight Talk Huawei H226C Refurbished Prepaid Wireless Home Phone With Bonus $15 Nationwide Plan also has voicemail.

items.categoryPath: Cell Phones/No-Contract Phones & Plans/Shop all No-Contract Phones
items.shortDescription: The Verizon Ellipsis Jetpack 2 Hotspot brings you the opportunity to connect up to eight Wi-Fi-enabled devices, such as tablets and laptops, to the Internet. It is an ideal size to put in your pocket and go. The long-lasting battery provides more time to check email, surf the web and play games on the super-fast Verizon 4G LTE network. The Verizon Jetpack hotspot has a durable construction that is made to last for a long time. It can make a thoughtful gift for a loved one who is always traveling. The system allows for up to 10 hours of use between charges, so you get plenty of connection time. Let this hotspot keep you online when needed most.
